description: Separated regions into own lookup table with country_id parent reference, fixed lookup update_references bugs

lookups.note: All fields except id and name are optional. Only one item per table can have is_default=true. Regions table includes additional country_id field as foreign key reference.

validation_rules.arrays: Used for multi-valued foreign keys (bean_type_id, region_id)
validation_rules.audit_timestamps: Automatically managed ISO datetime strings in UTC
validation_rules.boolean_flags: is_active defaults to true, is_default defaults to false
validation_rules.default_constraints: Only one lookup item per table can have is_default=true

new_in_v1.2.audit_system: All entities automatically track created_at and updated_at timestamps
new_in_v1.2.batch_lifecycle: Added is_active flag to mark depleted or inactive batches
new_in_v1.2.favorites_system: Added is_default flag to lookup tables with automatic enforcement
new_in_v1.2.api_endpoints: Added /default, /set_default, /clear_default endpoints for all lookup types

new_in_v1.3.regions_separation: Regions moved to separate lookup table with country_id parent reference
new_in_v1.3.lookup_bug_fixes: Fixed country and decaf_method update_references to use ID fields instead of names
new_in_v1.3.region_management: Added inline region management in country edit pages
